long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BGA Helper is an extension that allows view the number of games played, the number of victories, and the average number of points scored by opponents in the game you are currently playing.

Additionally, it has fantastic functionality for the game 6 nimmt! Specifically:

- The ability to see the exact cards your opponents have played.
- The capability to track cards that have been removed from the game and those still theoretically in play.
- Displaying the number of consecutive goals.
- When hovering your mouse over a card in your hand, you can highlight the nearest card in normal mode, the closest cards on the table in professional mode, and the closest among two cards in pro mode. You can adjust the highlighting settings in the extension popup. You can adjust the highlighting settings in the extension popup.

Support for other games will be added in the future!
Enjoy your gaming experience!
